mapper.select: select r.res_no,r.res_name,r.res_info,r.res_tel,r.res_loc,r.res_image,r.food_type, r.end_time,r.start_time,m.id,m.password,m.email,m.name,m.tel,m.enabled from (select row_number() over(order by res_no desc) as rnum, id, res_no, res_name,res_info,res_tel,res_loc,res_image,food_type,end_time,start_time from ko_restaurant) r, ko_member m where r.id=m.id and r.res_name LIKE '%'|| #{resName} ||'%' and rnum between #{getStartRowNumber} and #{getEndRowNumber}

select r.res_no,r.res_name,r.res_info,r.res_tel,r.res_loc,r.res_image,r.food_type, r.end_time,r.start_time,m.id,m.password,m.email,m.name,m.tel,m.enabled from (select row_number() over(order by res_no desc) as rnum, id, res_no, res_name,res_info,res_tel,res_loc,res_image,food_type,end_time,start_time from ko_restaurant) r, ko_member m WHERE r.id=m.id and r.food_type=#{foodType} AND r.res_loc=#{resLoc} and rnum between #{getStartRowNumber} and #{getEndRowNumber}
select count(*) from ko_restaurant where res_name LIKE '%'|| #{resName} ||'%'

select r.res_no,r.res_name,r.res_info,r.res_tel,r.res_loc,r.res_image,r.food_type, r.end_time,r.start_time,m.id,m.password,m.email,m.name,m.tel,m.enabled from (select row_number() over(order by res_no desc) as rnum, id, res_no, res_name,res_info,res_tel,res_loc,res_image,food_type,end_time,start_time from ko_restaurant) r, ko_member m where r.id=m.id and rnum between #{getStartRowNumber} and #{getEndRowNumber}

select r.res_no,r.res_name,r.res_info,r.res_tel,r.res_loc,r.res_image,r.food_type, r.end_time,r.start_time,m.id,m.password,m.email,m.name,m.tel,m.enabled from (select row_number() over(order by res_no desc) as rnum, id, res_no, res_name,res_info,res_tel,res_loc,res_image,food_type,end_time,start_time from ko_restaurant) r, ko_member m where r.id=m.id

SELECT a.res_no, a.res_name, a.res_info, a.res_tel, a.res_loc, a.res_image, a.food_type, a.start_time, a.end_time, b.id, b.email, b.tel, b.name, b.enabled
FROM ko_restaurant a, ko_member b WHERE a.id=b.id and res_no=#{value}
